articles.title: D.A. Bragg Announces Hate Crime Charges Against Steven Zajonc for Anti-Asian Attacks on Seven Manhattan Women - Manhattan District Attorney
articles.description: "These attacks on seven New York women, each fueled by anti-Asian hate, are yet another sobering reminder of the demonstrable fears AAPI communities, particularly AAPI women, in our City continue to face," said DA Bragg.
